00017 from wx import Panel, GridBagSizer, Notebook
00018 
00019 class mainPanel(Panel):
00020     """A custom container, grouping all the widgets."""
00021     def __init__(self, master):
00022         Panel.__init__(self, master)
00023         
00024         self.sizer = GridBagSizer(3, 2)
00025         self.widgets = {} # holds the widgets as values. The keys are tuples with
00026                           # three members (row, col, colspan)
00027 
00028         self.SetSizerAndFit(self.sizer)
00029         
00030     def addtoPanel(self, widget, position):
00031         if (position == (1, 1, 1) or position == (2, 0, 2)) and position in self.widgets.keys():
00032             self.__addNotebook(position, widget)
00033         else:
00034             self.sizer.Add(widget, pos = (position[0], position[1]), span = (1, position[2]), flag=wx.EXPAND|wx.ALL)
00035             self.widgets[position] = widget
00036 
00037     def __addNotebook(self, position, widget):
00038         """This function creates a notebook widget and replaces the self.widgets[position] with
00039         the notebook. If the notebook already exists then it is not replaced."""
00040         if isinstance(self.widgets[position], Notebook):
00041             self.widgets[position].AddPage(widget, widget.title)
00042         else:
00043             ntbk = Notebook(self, -1)
00044             ntbk.AddPage(self.widgets[position], self.widgets[position].title)
00045             ntbk.AddPage(widget, widget.title)
00046             self.widgets[position] = ntbk
00047 
00048 if __name__ == "__main__": # test - to be deleted after adding callbacks!
00049     import wx
00050     class cw(wx.Button):
00051         def __init__(self, parent):
00052             wx.Button.__init__(self, parent, size=(400, 100), label="Ok")
00053             self.title = 'Button Title'
00054             
00055     app = wx.App(False)
00056     x = wx.Frame(None)
00057     m = mainPanel(x)
00058     b1 = cw(x)
00059     b2 = cw(x)
00060     b3 = cw(x)
00061     b4 = cw(x)
00062     b5 = cw(x)
00063     
00064     m.addtoPanel(b1, (0, 0, 1))
00065     m.addtoPanel(b2, (0, 1, 1))
00066     m.addtoPanel(b3, (1, 0, 1))
00067     m.addtoPanel(b4, (1, 1, 1))
00068     m.addtoPanel(b5, (2, 0, 2))
00069     
00070     x.SetSize((800, 600))
00071     x.SetTitle('Test icons and shortcuts')
00072     x.Centre()
00073     x.Show(True)    
00074     app.MainLoop()
